subject: Product having issues with Thrustmaster tlcm
description_text: Hi I recently just brought your rumblers for my Thrustmaster TLCM peddle , when the rumblers turn on my throttle will be disabled or go half or full throttle by its on. Please let me know what can I do to solve this issue . Thank you

conversations.body_text: Hi Howard Xue,  Please provide us with your pedal model and order number, and share a demonstration video via Google Drive (make sure to grant access). Once we review the video, we will provide you with a solution as soon as possible.Â
